title: Does anyone actually think tsm will ever win worlds

replies.body: I'd love to see them win worlds and sure it's possible at some point. This year though....I'm finding it unlikely.

Does anyone actually think ~~TSM~~ NA will ever win worlds?

Fixed.

Until the level of competition in NA or even EU increases to be on the level of KR/CN, no. I will admit that Fnatic did an amazing job at MSI. I will never take that away from them, but that is only a single team in EU. Just like TSM was pretty dominant in NA spring split. It's just one team.

If one team dominates a region head over heels, then they are not really increasing in skill. The competition lacks. I think we need more International Events like MSI throughout the year so that competition in the West (more than just a single team) can practice against Top Tier teams more.

Back to the question at hand, no TSM will not win worlds, without more competitive teams in NA or more International Experience.
I don't think any NA team will win worlds in the foreseeable future.
This year could be the year.
